text: pratiksepa karannange hrdayanhi itamat ikmanin api biya æti vimata salasvannemu. mandayat ovun samanayan tæbimata (allah) kisima sadhakayak ovunta laba nodi sitiyadi ovun allahta samanayan tabannaha. ovun ræendana sthanaya nirayayi. (nirayehida) mema aparadhakaruvan ræendana sthanaya itamat narakaya
